thread.title: Excellent location and staff
thread.title_full: Excellent location and staff - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Fifth Avenue, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: clarapist70
title: Excellent location and staff
text: We stayed one night prior to a booking at an apt nearby. The location is fantastic, breakfast had plenty of hot and cold selection plus fresh fruit. The front desk staff (Especially Keisha) is absolutely lovely. Would recommend.
